files.description: Manages the lifecycle of all animations.
The base class for all animation implementations.
A container object that can have animations attached to it.
Contains all the core TypeScript types and interfaces for the engine.
The main entry point for the pixiani-engine package.
An animation that makes a sprite bounce in an arc.
A mesh-based black-hole spiral that deforms the sprite using a PIXI.MeshPlane to create swirling vertex displacements.
An animation for a spinning coin.
A complex popping animation with multiple stages.
A simple fade-in and fade-out animation.
A mesh-based waving effect that deforms the source sprite using a PIXI.MeshPlane (vertex grid).
A particle-based effect that spawns many small sprites from the source texture; particles are simulated with gravity, collisions and fade-out. Uses a custom particle system (not a MeshPlane).
A simple scaling animation.
An animation that scales, rotates, and then scales again.
An animation that makes a sprite bounce down stairs.
A mesh-based vortex (black hole) effect that uses PIXI.MeshPlane to distort the source sprite's texture.
The main entry point for the pixiani-anis package.
Tests for the ComplexPopAnimation.
Tests for the FadeAnimation.
Tests for the FlagWaveAnimation.
Tests for the ParticleSpinAnimation.
Tests for the ScaleAnimation.
Tests for the VortexAnimation.
